alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 7:49AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Broward County through 830 AM EDT... At 748 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Davie, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Lauderhill, Weston, Cooper City, Royal Palm Ranches, Sunshine Acres, Pine Island Ridge, Broadview Park, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Nova Southeastern University, Melrose Park, Chula Vista, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27 and Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
